function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Contractual issues","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of transparent communication about virus conditions and threats","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inactivation of sars-cov-2 using cu 2 o particles bound into a film","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Buffering measurements without sufficient quality assurance may lead to the inclusion of erroneous data in the analysis, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient public spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using a constant transmission rate assumption before the first lockdown may not accurately capture the changing transmission dynamics.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and analysis of large volumes of free-text data using machine-learning approach.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from food truck interactions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difference in neighbor noise perception based on time spent in different areas of the house","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of quarantine with tracking devices and fines","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incineration emitting polluting gases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 in wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of air conditioning ducts with dust and mold due to environmental conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Healthcare workers at risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of local population’s lifestyle and energy consumption habits","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limitation in search results due to lack of a chinese database","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning due to lack of understanding of indoor mobility data","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The emotional need for ’nature’ is explained as an inherited affection from the experience of choosing habitats and building dwellings, which can lead to a preference for natural characteristics in modern architectural spaces.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assuming an infection-fatality ratio of 0.75% without accounting for asymptomatic infections.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlooking the immediate health and well-being benefits of npis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of biocidal agents in inactivating coronaviruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of air pollutants such as formaldehyde, carbon monoxide, and particulate matter pm 2.5 are associated with increased covid-19 infections and fatalities.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of high-touch surfaces and equipment increasing the risk of surface transmission of viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on natural ventilation for residents’ health and safety","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data-driven standards ensuring resilience","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant correlations among the majority of the pairs of anxiety statements, supporting internal validity of the measurement scale.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Automatic detection of people using computer vision may lead to privacy concerns and surveillance issues","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unintentional supply of outdoor air due to porous building materials or other pathways","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of reactive behavior in disease spread modeling","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid population growth leading to increased demand for housing and congested urban areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in designing and carrying out experimental studies in emergency settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of aiirs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases due to reduced outdoor socialization and increased time spent indoors.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of spatial econometric models leading to oversight of spatial spillover effects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact on mental health","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Erosion of energy institutions and policy frameworks due to the impact of the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic divisions in the eu due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term confinement may influence future behavior, including outdoor activities and social interactions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous ugs distribution and accessibility","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of expertise in it, domain experts, and data scientists for real-time big data processing platforms.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unhealthy urban lifestyles","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of handheld and portable ultrasound solutions for covid-19 patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited data accuracy or completeness in the epidemiological data and npi timelines from the ministry of health and other sources.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of indoor temperature and humidity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stigmatization and anxiety related to covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for touchless and smart home products may lead to privacy and data security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration of infection prevention in sustainable designs","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Distress from exposure to pandemic-related news","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing sample materials during a pandemic carries the risk of incomplete or inaccurate detection of contagious viruses such as sars-cov-2.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact of interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
